original_title: BREAKING: President Trump just called for Tina Peters RELEASE! He says there will be “HARSH MEASURES” taken if she’s not!  — The Donald
article_summary: President Trump calls for the release of Tina Peters, threatening "harsh measures" if she isn't, in a post urging supporters to show their support. Peters is currently in jail, facing charges in a Colorado state court. However, Trump's powers do not extend to pardoning state crimes, and there's debate on how he could intervene.</s>
